subject: Fwd: Order #SSN5609 confirmed
description_text:

Michaela Gordon Owner | Senior Bookkeeper, Main Street Virtual (603) 836-9183 (207) 520-9988 www.mainstreetvirtual.com michaela@mainstreetvirtual.com Begin forwarded message: From: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> Date: January 1, 2026 at 9:19:35 AM EST To: michaela@mainstreetvirtual.com Subject: Order #SSN5609 confirmed ﻿

conversations.body_text: Hi Michaela Gordon,     Your order was shipped in two separate packages.  The power supply was delayed for two weeks due to product upgrades. We have now completed the upgrades and shipped it on the 14th.  We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Should you have any questions, we will prioritize addressing them for you.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806036
